metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13638 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
GNU patch through 2.7.6 is vulnerable to OS shell command injection that can be exploited by opening a crafted patch file that contains an ed style diff payload with shell metacharacters. The ed editor does not need to be present on the vulnerable system. This is different from CVE-2018-1000156.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13638` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

patch - 2.7.5-1ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: patch package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.5-1ubuntu0.16.04.2').
